question: A scientist wants to collect several bird eggs on an island. She needs a case that will protect the eggs she collects. Which of the following cases would best protect the eggs?
candidate_answers: (A) a hard metal case with flexible foam lining (B) a flexible metal case with smooth plastic lining (C) a strong wooden case with lightweight plastic lining (D) a lightweight wooden case with strong aluminum lining
answer: a strong wooden case with lightweight plastic lining
label: C
